name: TI_2_1_4_Clinical_Audit_Triggers
title: TI.2.1.4 Clinical Audit Triggers (Function)
purpose: Clinical Audit Triggers are designed to capture certain clinical events, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.4#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to track all clinical alerts.

statement.label: TI.2.1.4#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to track all acknowledgements of clinically-significant report changes.

statement.label: TI.2.1.4#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to track when decision support alerts have been disabled.
